sys_script_include.description: Gets the follow user 's information: Name Mail Department
sys_script_include.name: GetUserData

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_383c497e1bb33300505640c6cc4bcbbf
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.GetUserData</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Gets the follow user 's information:
Name
Mail
Department</description><name>GetUserData</name><script><![CDATA[var GetUserData = Class.create();
// Extend the global.AbstractAjaxProcessor class
GetUserData.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,{
	
	getEmail: function() {
		var mail = "mail";
		var currentUser = gs.getUser(); 
		var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		userRecord.get(currentUser.getManagerID());
		
		gs.info('getEmail: ' + currentUser.getManagerID());
		
		var userData = {};
		
		userData.email = userRecord.getValue('email');
		userData.department = userRecord.getValue('department');
		userData.name = userRecord.getValue('sys_id');
		
		return JSON.stringify(userData);
	},
	type: 'GetUserData'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-13 19:21:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>383c497e1bb33300505640c6cc4bcbbf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>32</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetUserData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_383c497e1bb33300505640c6cc4bcbbf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-17 14:49:47</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
